class.name: CATMSHConnectivityServices
class.abstract: Class used to access to finite element connectivities.

method.name: GetConnectivity
method.abstract: Retreives a finite element connectivity from its name.

method.name: GetFirstConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the first finite element connectivity.

method.name: GetNumberOfConnectivities
method.abstract: Retreives the total number of defined finite element connectivities.

class.name: CATMSHCriterionServices
class.abstract: Method to access informations on quality criteria.

method.name: GetCriterion
method.abstract: Retreives a quality criteria from its name.

class.name: CATMSHElement
class.abstract: Object representing a finite element.

method.name: GetConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the element's connectivity.

method.name: GetLinkedNodes
method.abstract: Returns a pointer on the list of element's nodes.

method.name: GetMesh
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh which contains the element.

method.name: GetMeshDomain
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Domain which contains the element.

method.name: GetNodesCoordinates
method.abstract: Retreives all nodes coordinates.

method.name: GetNumber
method.abstract: Returns the element number.

method.name: GetNumberOfLinkedNodes
method.abstract: Returns the number of linked nodes.

method.name: GetTag
method.abstract: Returns the integer tag associated to the element.

method.name: GetVisuAttribute
method.abstract: Returns graphic attribute for the finite element.

method.name: IsActive
method.abstract: Returns the element activity.

method.name: IsDeleted
method.abstract: Check if the finite element is deleted.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next element in the Mesh.

method.name: Previous
method.abstract: Returns the previous element in the Mesh.

class.name: CATMSHElementVisuAttribute
class.abstract: Class to create a graphic attribute for a finite element.

constructor.name: CATMSHElementVisuAttribute
constructor.abstract: Constructs a default graphic attribute for a finite element (black).

method.name: GetColorRGB
method.abstract: Gets the red, green and blue components color.

method.name: SetColorRGB
method.abstract: Sets the red, green and blue components color.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

method.name: operator ==
method.abstract: Equality operator.

class.name: CATMSHExtIConnectivity
class.abstract: Adapter for CATIMSHConnectivity interface.

method.name: Build
method.abstract: Builds internal informations.

method.name: CreateGeometricalEngine
method.abstract: Creates an returns an new geometrical engine compatible with the connectivity.

method.name: GetEdgeConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity corresponding to a face.

method.name: GetEdgesOfFaces
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces definition in term of edges.

method.name: GetEdgesOfNodes
method.abstract: Retrieves the edges connected to edges.

method.name: GetEdgesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the edges permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetFaceConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity corresponding to a face.

method.name: GetFacesOfEdges
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces connected to edges.

method.name: GetFacesOfNodes
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces connected to edges.

method.name: GetFacesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the faces permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetGeometricalEngine
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical engine associated with the connectivity.

method.name: GetInfos
method.abstract: Returns general informations on the finite element connectivity (dimension and sizes).

method.name: GetInteriorAngleOfEdges
method.abstract: Returns the ideal interior angle for each edge.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the connectivity.

method.name: GetNodesOfEdges
method.abstract: Retrieves the edges definition in terms of nodes.

method.name: GetNodesOfFaces
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces definition in term of nodes.

method.name: GetNodesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the nodes permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetNumber
method.abstract: Returns the finite element connectivity number.

method.name: GetTypeOfNodes
method.abstract: Returns the type of each nodes.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next finite element connectivity.

data.name: _EdgeConnectivity
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the connectivity of the edges.

data.name: _EdgesOfFaces
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the edges number of the faces.

data.name: _EdgesOfNodes
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the edges number connected to nodes.

data.name: _EdgesPermutation
data.abstract: Array containing the edges permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

data.name: _FaceConnectivity
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the connectivity of the faces.

data.name: _FacesOfEdges
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the faces number connected to edges.

data.name: _FacesOfNodes
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the faces number connected to nodes.

data.name: _FacesPermutation
data.abstract: Array containing the faces permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

data.name: _Infos
data.abstract: General informations on the finite element connectivity.

data.name: _IntAngleOfEdges
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _IntAngleOfEdges array.

data.name: _NodesOfEdges
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the nodes number of edges.

data.name: _NodesOfFaces
data.abstract: Array containing in sequence the nodes number of the faces.

data.name: _NodesPermutation
data.abstract: Array containing the nodes permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

data.name: _OrientOfEdges
data.abstract: Array containing the edges orientation of the faces.

data.name: _PtEdgesOfFaces
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _EdgesOfFaces array.

data.name: _PtEdgesOfNodes
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _EdgesOfNodes array.

data.name: _PtFacesOfEdges
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _FacesOfEdges array.

data.name: _PtFacesOfNodes
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _FacesOfNodes array.

data.name: _PtNodesOfEdges
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _NodesOfEdges array.

data.name: _PtNodesOfFaces
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _NodesOfFaces array.

data.name: _TypeOfNodes
data.abstract: Array of backward pointer to _TypeOfNodes array.

class.name: CATMSHExtICriterion
class.abstract: Adapter for CATIMSHCriterion interface.

method.name: GetInfos
method.abstract: Returns informations on the quality criterion such as minimum and maximum value .

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the quality criterion.

method.name: IsVisible
method.abstract: Returns if the criterion is use by the mesh analysis quality.

method.name: NeedGeometricSupport
method.abstract: Returns if the criterion needs geometric support.

data.name: _Infos
data.abstract: Informations on the quality criterion.

data.name: _Mag
data.abstract: Name of the unit criterion.

data.name: _Name
data.abstract: Name of the quality criterion.

class.name: CATMSHExtIMesher
class.abstract: Adapter for CATIMSHMesher interface.

method.name: BeforeUpdating
method.abstract: Perform cleaning operations before updating a Mesh Part.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Check the supports of the Mesh Part.

method.name: CloseEdition
method.abstract: Perform mesher-specific operations before exiting edition mode for a Mesh Part.

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Query the mesher about the type of the Mesh Part.

class.name: CATMSHGeometricalEngine
class.abstract: Object that handles necessary informations about a finite element in order to compute a quality criterion.

constructor.name: CATMSHGeometricalEngine
constructor.abstract: Constructs a geometrical engine corresponding to a given connectivity.

method.name: ComputeArea
method.abstract: Compute the area of a specified iNuFace, intermediates nodes are take account.

method.name: GetCenter
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the center of element.

method.name: GetConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity associated with.

method.name: GetCoordinates
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to an array containing nodes coordinates in the following order: X0, Y0, Z0, X1, Y1, Z1, .

method.name: GetCoordinates
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the array containing nodes coordinates of iNuNode in the following order: X, Y, Z .

method.name: GetDimension
method.abstract: Returns the dimension of the connectivity.

method.name: GetMainAreas
method.abstract: Returns the pointer of faces areas table (0 to NbFaces-1).

method.name: GetMainEdge
method.abstract: Returns the vector of the specified edge (ignore intermediate nodes).

method.name: GetMainLengths
method.abstract: Returns a pointer on the edges lengths table 0 to NbEdges-1.

method.name: GetMainNormal
method.abstract: Returns the direction of normal face specified ( 0 for 2D element), the intermediates nodes are ignored.

method.name: GetMaxEdge
method.abstract: Returns the maximum length of the edges.

method.name: GetMinEdge
method.abstract: Returns the minimum length of the edges.

method.name: GetShapeFunction
method.abstract: Returns the shape function associated with.

method.name: Init
method.abstract: Initialize the geometrical engine with the geometry of a finite element.

method.name: Init
method.abstract: Initialize the geometrical engine with the geometry of a finite element.

method.name: SetCoordinates
method.abstract: Set coordinates of specified node.

class.name: CATMSHListOfMeshPart
class.abstract: Object managing a list of pointer on Mesh Parts.

constructor.name: CATMSHListOfMeshPart
constructor.abstract: Constructs an empty list of Mesh Parts.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Adds a new Mesh Part at the end of the list.

method.name: Locate
method.abstract: Locates a Mesh Part in the list.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.abstract: Empty the list.

method.name: RemovePosition
method.abstract: Removes an item in the list.

method.name: Size
method.abstract: Returns the number of Mesh Parts in list.

method.name: operator ==
method.abstract: Equality operator.

method.name: operator []
method.abstract: Access a Mesh Part in the list.

class.name: CATMSHMeshDomain
class.abstract: Object representing a Mesh Domain.

method.name: AddRef
method.abstract: Increments the reference count.

method.name: GetElements
method.abstract: Retreive all finite elements contained in the Mesh Domain.

method.name: GetMesh
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh containing the Mesh Domain.

method.name: GetMeshPart
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Part containing the Mesh Domain.

method.name: GetNumberOfElements
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite elements contained in the Mesh Domain.

method.name: GetTag
method.abstract: Returns the integer tag associated to the Mesh Domain.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next Mesh Domain in the Mesh.

method.name: Previous
method.abstract: Returns the previous Mesh Domain in the Mesh.

method.name: Release
method.abstract: Decrements the reference count.

class.name: CATMSHMeshManagerServices
class.abstract: Class to access the Mesh Manager.

method.name: GetManager
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Manager of a given document.

class.name: CATMSHModifyNotification
class.abstract: Class for notifications of a finite element mesh modification.

class.name: CATMSHNode
class.abstract: Object representing a finite element node.

class.name: CATMSHNodeVisuAttribute
class.abstract: Class to create a graphic attribute for a finite element node.

constructor.name: CATMSHNodeVisuAttribute
constructor.abstract: Constructs a default graphic attribute for a finite element node (black).

method.name: GetColorRGB
method.abstract: Gets the red, green and blue components color.

method.name: GetSymbolType
method.abstract: Sets the symbol type used for finite element nodes.

method.name: SetColorRGB
method.abstract: Sets the red, green and blue components color.

method.name: SetSymbolType
method.abstract: Returns the symbol type used for finite element nodes.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

method.name: operator ==
method.abstract: Equality operator.

class.name: CATMSHSelectionTrap
class.abstract: Object representing a selection trap.

constructor.name: CATMSHSelectionTrap
constructor.abstract: Constructs a selection trap from contour definition.

method.name: Contains
method.abstract: Query if a given location is included within the trap.

method.name: GetMode
method.abstract: Returns the selection mode of the trap.

method.name: GetPlane
method.abstract: Returns the plane on which the trap is defined.

method.name: GetPoints
method.abstract: Get the definition of the trap contour.

enum.name: CATMSHExternalReferenceStatus
enum.abstract: Describe the status of an external reference, such as geometry for support of the Mesh Part.

class.name: CATIMSHAdvWorkbenchAddin
class.abstract: Interface to create an addin within Advanced Meshing Tools workbench.

class.name: CATIMSHAssociativity
class.abstract: Interface representing the Mesh Associativity.

method.name: AddLinkedEdges
method.abstract: Associate a set of finite element's edges to a geometry.

method.name: AddLinkedElements
method.abstract: Associate a set of finite elements to a geometry.

method.name: AddLinkedFaces
method.abstract: Associate a set of finite element's faces to a geometry.

method.name: AddLinkedNodes
method.abstract: Associate a set of finite element nodes to a geometry.

method.name: GetElementEdgesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives all finite element's edges associated to a geometry.

method.name: GetElementFacesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives all finite element's faces associated to a geometry.

method.name: GetLink
method.abstract: Creates or retreives a link between the Mesh and the geometry.

method.name: GetMeshPartsOn
method.abstract: Retreives the list of Mesh Parts which have a given support.

method.name: GetNodesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives all the finite element nodes associated to a set of geometries.

method.name: GetNumberOfElementEdgesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives a finite element's edges associated to a geometry.

method.name: GetNumberOfElementFacesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives the number of finite element's faces associated to a geometry.

method.name: GetNumberOfNodesLinkedTo
method.abstract: Retreives the number of finite element nodes associated to a set of geometries.

class.name: CATIMSHConnectivity
class.abstract: Interface representing a finite element connectivity.

method.name: CreateGeometricalEngine
method.abstract: Creates an returns an new geometrical engine compatible with the connectivity.

method.name: GetEdgeConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity corresponding to a face.

method.name: GetEdgesOfFaces
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces definition in term of edges.

method.name: GetEdgesOfNodes
method.abstract: Retrieves the edges connected to edges.

method.name: GetEdgesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the edges permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetFaceConnectivity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity corresponding to a face.

method.name: GetFacesOfEdges
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces connected to edges.

method.name: GetFacesOfNodes
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces connected to edges.

method.name: GetFacesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the faces permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetGeometricalEngine
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical engine associated with the connectivity.

method.name: GetInfos
method.abstract: Returns general informations on the finite element connectivity (dimension and sizes).

method.name: GetInteriorAngleOfEdges
method.abstract: Returns the ideal interior angle for each edge.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the connectivity.

method.name: GetNodesOfEdges
method.abstract: Retrieves the edges definition in terms of nodes.

method.name: GetNodesOfFaces
method.abstract: Retrieves the faces definition in term of nodes.

method.name: GetNodesPermutation
method.abstract: Returns the nodes permutation that should be applied in order to reverse the element.

method.name: GetNumber
method.abstract: Returns the finite element connectivity number.

method.name: GetTypeOfNodes
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of each nodes.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next finite element connectivity.

class.name: CATIMSHCriterion
class.abstract: Interface representing a finite element quality criterion.

method.name: Compute
method.abstract: Computes the criterion for an finite element.

method.name: GetInfos
method.abstract: Returns informations on the quality criterion such as minimum and maximum value .

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the quality criterion.

method.name: IsImplemented
method.abstract: Determines whether the criterion can be computed for a given connectivity or not.

method.name: IsVisible
method.abstract: Returns if the criterion is useful by the mesh analysis quality.

method.name: NeedGeometricSupport
method.abstract: Returns if the criterion needs geometric support.

class.name: CATIMSHGroup
class.abstract: Interface representing group of finite elements or finite elements nodes.

method.name: GetElements
method.abstract: Retreives the list of finite elements belonging to the Group.

method.name: GetNodes
method.abstract: Retreives the list of finite elements nodes belonging to the Group.

method.name: GetNumberOfElements
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite elements belonging to the Group.

method.name: GetNumberOfNodes
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite elements nodes belonging to the Group.

class.name: CATIMSHLocalSpecification
class.abstract: Interface representing a local specification within a Mesh Part.

method.name: AddSupport
method.abstract: Defines the support of the local specification.

method.name: AddSupports
method.abstract: Defines the support of the local specification.

method.name: GetAttribute
method.abstract: Retreives the integer value of a local specification.

method.name: GetAttribute
method.abstract: Retreives the real double value of a local specification.

method.name: GetAttribute
method.abstract: Retreives the Character Value of a local specification.

method.name: GetSupports
method.abstract: Retreives all supports.

method.name: SetAttribute
method.abstract: Valuates a local specification attribute to an integer value.

method.name: SetAttribute
method.abstract: Valuates a local specification attribute to a real double value.

method.name: SetAttribute
method.abstract: Valuates a local specification attribute to a Character value.

class.name: CATIMSHMesh
class.abstract: Interface representing the Mesh (nodes and elements).

method.name: CreateElements
method.abstract: Creates finite elements.

method.name: CreateGroup
method.abstract: Creates a group of finite elements nodes.

method.name: CreateGroup
method.abstract: Creates a group of finite elements.

method.name: CreateMeshDomain
method.abstract: Create a new Mesh Domain.

method.name: CreateNodes
method.abstract: Creates nodes.

method.name: CreateNodesCondensedOn
method.abstract: Create nodes condensed on nodes from another Mesh.

method.name: DeleteElements
method.abstract: Delete elements.

method.name: DeleteNodes
method.abstract: Delete nodes.

method.name: GetAllCoordinates
method.abstract: Retreive coordinates of all finite element nodes contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetAllElements
method.abstract: Retreive all finite elements contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetAllLinkedNodes
method.abstract: Retreives the linked nodes of all finite elements contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetAllNodes
method.abstract: Retreive all finite element nodes contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetElementFromTag
method.abstract: Retreives a finite element from its integer tag.

method.name: GetElementsConnectivities
method.abstract: Retreives the connectivity of all finite elements contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetFirstElement
method.abstract: Returns the first finite element of the Mesh.

method.name: GetFirstMeshDomain
method.abstract: Returns the first Mesh Domain of the Mesh.

method.name: GetFirstMeshPart
method.abstract: Returns the first Mesh Part of the Mesh.

method.name: GetFirstNode
method.abstract: Returns the first finite element node of the Mesh.

method.name: GetLastNode
method.abstract: Returns the last finite element node of the Mesh.

method.name: GetMeshDomainFromTag
method.abstract: Retreives a Mesh Domain from its integer tag.

method.name: GetMeshManager
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Manager corresponding to the Mesh.

method.name: GetNodeFromTag
method.abstract: Retreives a finite element node from its integer tag.

method.name: GetNumberOfElements
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite elements contained in the Mesh.

method.name: GetNumberOfLinkedNodes
method.abstract: Computes the total number of linked nodes i.

method.name: GetNumberOfMeshDomains
method.abstract: Returns the total number of Mesh Domain of the Mesh.

method.name: GetNumberOfNodes
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite element nodes contained in the Mesh.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Check if a node is contained in the Mesh.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Check if a finite element is contained in the Mesh.

method.name: ModifyElement
method.abstract: Modify a finite element.

method.name: ModifyNode
method.abstract: Modify a finite element node.

method.name: SetCurrentMeshDomain
method.abstract: Set a new current Mesh Domain.

method.name: UpdateVisualization
method.abstract: Update visualization after Mesh modifications ( nodes/elements creation, modification or deletion).

class.name: CATIMSHMeshDomain
class.abstract: Interface representing a Mesh Domain.

method.name: GetMeshDomain
method.abstract: Returns the corresponding Mesh Domain.

class.name: CATIMSHMeshManager
class.abstract: Interface representing the Mesh Manager.

method.name: CreateMeshPart
method.abstract: Creates a Mesh Part.

method.name: GetAssociativity
method.abstract: Returns an interface on the associativity between mesh and geometry.

method.name: GetMesh
method.abstract: Returns an interface on the finite element mesh.

method.name: RemoveMeshPart
method.abstract: Remove a Mesh Part.

class.name: CATIMSHMeshPart
class.abstract: Interface representing a Mesh Part.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Check the Mesh Part.

method.name: CloseEdition
method.abstract: Exit the Mesh Part from the edition mode.

method.name: Contains
method.abstract: Check if the Mesh Part contains a given finite element.

method.name: Copy
method.abstract: Copy the content (nodes & elements) of a Mesh Part into the current one.

method.name: CreateLocalSpecification
method.abstract: Creates a new local specification within the Mesh Part.

method.name: CreateLocalSpecification
method.abstract: Creates a new local specification within the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetActivity
method.abstract: Returns the current state of the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetElements
method.abstract: Retreives the list of finite elements belonging to the Mesh Parts.

method.name: GetExternalReference
method.abstract: Retreive an external reference in a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetFirstMeshDomain
method.abstract: Returns the first Mesh Domain of the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Retreives the integer value of a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Retreives the real double value of a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Retreives the CATISpecObject value of a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Retreives the character value of a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetLastMeshDomain
method.abstract: Returns the last Mesh Domain of the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetMeshManager
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Manager corresponding to the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetMeshVisibility
method.abstract: Retrieves the visibility status of the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetNumberOfElements
method.abstract: Returns the number of finite elements belonging to the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetNumberOfExternalReferences
method.abstract: Returns the number of references defined in a global mesh specification.

method.name: GetNumberOfSupports
method.abstract: Returns the number of supports defined.

method.name: GetParentMeshParts
method.abstract: Retreives the parent Mesh Parts of the part.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Retreives a support from it's number.

method.name: GetSupportConnector
method.abstract: Returns a CATISamAnalysisConnector interface on a Mesh Part geometric support.

method.name: IsInEdition
method.abstract: Check if the Mesh Part is in edition mode.

method.name: IsOfType
method.abstract: Query the Mesh Part about the type of mesh generated.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next Mesh Part of the Mesh.

method.name: OpenEdition
method.abstract: Enter the Mesh Part into edition mode.

method.name: RemoveMesh
method.abstract: Remove the mesh corresponding to the Mesh Part.

method.name: SetActivity
method.abstract: Set the current state of the Mesh Part.

method.name: SetExternalReference
method.abstract: Valuates a global mesh specification with external reference.

method.name: SetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Valuates a global mesh specification to a integer value.

method.name: SetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Valuates a global mesh specification to a real double value.

method.name: SetGlobalSpecification
method.abstract: Valuates a global mesh specification to a character value.

method.name: SetMeshPartsToCapture
method.abstract: Set the list of candidate Mesh Parts for capture.

method.name: SetMeshVisibility
method.abstract: Sets the Mesh Part visualization status.

method.name: SetSupport
method.abstract: Defines a support.

class.name: CATIMSHMesher
class.abstract: Interface representing the Mesher.

method.name: BeforeUpdating
method.abstract: Perform cleaning operations before updating a Mesh Part.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Check the supports of the Mesh Part.

method.name: CloseEdition
method.abstract: Perform mesher-specific operations before exiting edition mode for a Mesh Part.

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Query the mesher about the type of the Mesh Part.

method.name: Mesh
method.abstract: Build the mesh corresponding to the Mesh Part.

class.name: CATIMSHSelectedEdge
class.abstract: Interface used to select a finite element edge.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Returns the selected finite element edge.

class.name: CATIMSHSelectedElement
class.abstract: Interface used to select a finite element.

method.name: GetElement
method.abstract: Returns the selected finite element.

method.name: GetPickPoint
method.abstract: Retreives the picking point on the finite element.

class.name: CATIMSHSelectedFace
class.abstract: Interface used to select a finite element face.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the selected finite element face.

class.name: CATIMSHSelectedNode
class.abstract: Interface used to select a finite element node.

method.name: GetNode
method.abstract: Returns the selected finite element node.

class.name: CATIMSHTrapSelector
class.abstract: Interface to be used to build a list of selected objects from a trap contour.

method.name: BuildSelection
method.abstract: Build the list of selected objects.

class.name: CATIMSHVisuManager
class.abstract: Interface giving access to visualization services on the Mesh Manager.

method.name: BuildPathElement
method.abstract: Build a path element from a finite element node.

method.name: BuildPathElement
method.abstract: Build a path element from a Mesh Domain.

method.name: BuildPathElement
method.abstract: Build a path element from a finite element.

method.name: GetResolution1D
method.abstract: Get the resolution of the entire mesh ( 1D elements only ).

method.name: GetVisibility
method.abstract: Returns the visibility of the entire mesh (nodes and elements).

method.name: SetPickMode
method.abstract: Set the sensitivity to picking of the entire mesh (nodes and elements).

method.name: SetResolution1D
method.abstract: Set the resolution of the entire mesh ( 1D elements only ).

method.name: SetVisibility
method.abstract: Set the visibility of the entire mesh (nodes and elements).

method.name: SetVisualizationMode
method.abstract: Set the mode used to visualize finite elements.

method.name: SetVisualizationWay
method.abstract: Set the way used to visualize finite elements.

enum.name: CATMSHVisuMode
enum.abstract: Mode used to visualisation finite elements.

enum.name: CATMSHVisuWay
enum.abstract: Way used to visualize finite elements.

struct.name: CATMSHAssElementEdge
struct.abstract: Structure representing a finite element's edge.

data.name: _Element
data.abstract: Pointer to the finite element.

data.name: _EdgeNumber
data.abstract: Edge number: from 0 to n-1, where n is the total number of edges in _Element connectivity.

struct.name: CATMSHAssElementFace
struct.abstract: Structure representing a finite element's face.

data.name: _Element
data.abstract: Pointer to the finite element.

data.name: _FaceNumber
data.abstract: Face number: from 0 to n-1, where n is the total number of faces in _Element connectivity.

struct.name: CATMSHConnecInfos
struct.abstract: General informations on the finite element connectivity.

data.name: Dimension
data.abstract: Dimension of the finite element connectivity.

data.name: NbNodes
data.abstract: Number of nodes.

data.name: NbEdges
data.abstract: Number of edges.

data.name: NbFaces
data.abstract: Number of faces.

data.name: NbIntNodes
data.abstract: Number of intermediates nodes.

data.name: Sens
data.abstract:
